WorkItem.Description:
Hi
 
I have converted Excel5 into Excel2007, and inside Excel5 cells content, I have some spaces before text (so that I can make affect like text indentation).
But in the resulting Excel2007 file, all the spaces before have been removed and make no indentation affect anymore.
 
I have my reason not to use the cell indentation, that's is another issue with PDF.
 
Is there anyone has the same problem?
 
Thanks
Loc
WorkItem.Summary: White space string prefix stripped by PHPExcel_Writer_Excel2007

Comments.Message: Updated: This issue happens with Excel5 converting to PDF also. All the spaces before the text inside cell has been removed.

Renaming this issue to better indicate that it is an issue with PHPExcel_Writer_Excel2007

Excel5 to Excel 2007, lost the spaces prefix inside cell content
> White space string beginning stripped by PHPExcel_Writer_Excel2007
